text: Brick Lane district centre. |Site information|Details| ||| |Address|Shoreditch High Street| |Area [ha]|4.35| |Ward|Weavers| |PTAL [2031]|6a-6b| |Planning designations|z Area of substandard air quality z London View Management Framework (views 8A.1 – Westminster Pier to St Paul’s Cathedral, and 9A.1 – King Henry VIII’s Mound to St Paul’s Cathedral) z Central Activities Zone z Archaeological Priority Area (Spitalfields and Brick Lane, tier 2) z Conservation Area (Fournier Street, adjacent to site) z Statutory Listed Buildings (Braithwaite Viaduct, Grade II; Street Name Plaque Attached to Number 125 Brick Lane, Grade II, adjacent to the site; 2-38 Cheshire Street, Grade II, adjacent to the site)| |Relevant Permissions|PA/14/02011 – outline permission for comprehensive mixed-use redevelopment including residential, business, commercial, and community uses. Included detailed permission for the tallest building and the retail arches.| 394 Tower Hamlets Local Plan
